Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the age of the person in the photograph, stating that he is 47 years old when he is actually 30 years old.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the person in the photograph is named Moinuddin and has been a student at JNU since 1989.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the person in the photograph is a JNU student named Moinuddin based solely on the image, without verifying the information.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim presents an alternative explanation by stating that the person in the photograph is actually Pankaj Mishra, a JNU student, contradicting the initial claim.
